## Implementation Roadmap

### Phase 1: Setup (Week 1)
- Set up payment processing for all tiers
- Create sales pages/landing pages
- Prepare onboarding sequences
- Train sales team on objection handling

### Phase 2: Launch (Week 2-3)
- Soft launch to warm audience
- Test messaging and pricing
- Gather initial feedback
- Monitor conversion rates by tier

### Phase 3: Optimization (Week 4-8)
- Analyze tier performance
- A/B test messaging variants
- Refine objection responses based on real conversations
- Adjust pricing if needed

### Phase 4: Scaling (Month 3+)
- Expand marketing to cold traffic
- Develop case studies and testimonials
- Consider additional tiers or add-ons
- Periodic validation checks

## Usage Notes

This document serves as your master offer blueprint. Use it to:
1. Guide all marketing and sales conversations
2. Train team members on offer positioning
3. Reference when creating sales collateral
4. Validate future offer modifications

**Related Deliverables**:
- Entry Tier Offer Sheet: `{{business_name}}-entry-offer-sheet.md`
- Core Tier Offer Sheet: `{{business_name}}-core-offer-sheet.md`
- Premium Tier Offer Sheet: `{{business_name}}-premium-offer-sheet.md`
- Pricing Strategy Document: `{{business_name}}-pricing-strategy.md`
- Objection Handling Guide: `{{business_name}}-objection-handling.md`

**Maintenance**:
- Review quarterly or after major market changes
- Update messaging based on customer feedback
- Refine pricing based on conversion data
- Run validation checks periodically using `/offer-forge` â†’ `*validate`
